attributes.action: The Labour Party should be forced to change its name
attributes.additional_details:
The Labour Party should be forced to change its name . Since dropping clause 4 the party no longer represents the thoughts and objectives of the ordinary working man in the United Kingdom.

Since 1994 they have slowly evolved into a neo Tory party or a right wing s.d.p moving more towards privatisation and de centralisation of public owned institutions such as the nhs and police force.

I strongly believe that the party's name no longer represents the ideals of the workers movement
